name: 2 Calming Games
description:
No ads! 2 logic/puzzle games designed to quickly get you calm and relaxed

Stressed or anxious before a job interview, an exam or just had some relationship trouble ? Are you generally feeling stressed out and anxious? Play, quickly get calm and carry on!

Features :

• 2 puzzle/strategy games to quickly take off your mind from worries and stress and achieve a state of calm and relaxation while also having a fun time
• -no ads!
